alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:55AM CDT until April 05 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Union County in south central Arkansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1255 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Urbana, or 11 miles southeast of El Dorado, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Strong, Urbana, Lawson, Moro Bay State Park, Hillsboro, New London and Pigeon Hill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
